Spanish test: 33%. *claps* Way to fail, Yanshosh.

(If ya can't tell, I'm in a very bad mood today.)

Mi no hablar la esapanol muchos buena! (The mistakes in that sentence 
are intentional.)

::Shredder/Kluster/Rex::

Shredder turns around to look at the others near him, glancing back 
at Kluster, who hadn't even noticed.

"I warned the Maximals of the Destron threat," he says to 
them, "Hopefully the..."

"AHA!" Kluster interrupts, not realizing that he was cutting into 
Shredder's sentence, "Megatron's, KitKat's, and Black Arachnia's 
signatures met an hour ago! There was no gunfire, so I don't think 
they have evil intentions for each other.."

Shredder nods, turning back to Kluster. "They don't. But they have 
evil intentions for Maximals. I've foiled Megatron's plans before, I 
know that he wants the Maximals dead."

Kluster frowns, looking at the reports again. "Zardus was not in that 
meeting... Perhaps he's not in with the Predacons anymore?"

"When I first got here, the Alliance and the Maximals were allied," 
Shredder says after nodding, "The Alliance was allied with the 
Maximals far more than they had been allied with the Predacons. 
Megatron wants to destroy you, I'm sure the Alliance will help."

Kluster nods, activating his comm-link. "Rex, report to my position. 
I have a few things for you to do."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In his quarters, Rex groans, getting up off his bed as he recieves 
Kluster's transmission.

"On my way," he replies, exiting his room.
